workflow.name: Automate webinar registration with Zoom & KlickTipp form integration
workflow.description:
![Zoom registration wf.png](fileId:2329)

**Community Node Disclaimer**: This workflow uses KlickTipp community nodes.

### Introduction
This workflow automates Zoom recurring webinar registrations by capturing form submissions from a KlickTipp Landingpage and enriching contacts with webinar details. Depending on the registrant‚Äôs webinar choice (for example ‚ÄúE-Mail Zustellung f√ºr Anf√§nger‚Äù or ‚ÄúE-Mail Zustellung f√ºr Experten‚Äù), the system fetches the correct Zoom webinar info and writes it into KlickTipp. Ideal for running scalable webinar funnels without manual data entry.

### Benefits
- **Instant contact enrichment**: Automatically populates KlickTipp with Zoom join links and session times.  
- **Dynamic segmentation**: Applies specific tags for ‚ÄúBeginner‚Äù or ‚ÄúExpert‚Äù webinar participants.  
- **Scalable structure**: Router logic allows easy extension for more webinar types.  

### Key Features
- **KlickTipp Trigger**:
  - Starts the workflow when a landing-page form is submitted via outbound webhook.
- **Switch Router**:
  - Routes based on the webinar selection.
  - Supports multiple webinar options.
- **Zoom API Integration**:
  - Retrieves recurring webinar data including join URL and future occurrences.
  - webinar IDs are set per path (Beginner vs Expert).
- **KlickTipp Contact Sync**:
  - Updates or subscribes contacts in the correct list.
  - Writes custom fields for join link and next session timestamp.
  - Applies topic-specific tags for segmentation.

---

### Custom Fields (KlickTipp Setup)

| **Name**                        | **Field type**   |
|---------------------------------|----------------|
| Zoom \| webinar choice          | Line Text          |
| Zoom \| webinar start timestamp | Date & Time   |
| Zoom \| Join URL                | URL            |
| Zoom \| Registration ID         | Line Text          |
| Zoom \| Duration webinar        | Line Text              |

---

### Tags (Segmentation)

- Zoom webinar E-Mail Zustellung f√ºr Anf√§nger  
- Zoom webinar E-Mail Zustellung f√ºr Experten  

---

### Setup Instructions
**KlickTipp Preparation**
- Create the custom fields above.  
- Add dropdown for webinar choice on landing page.  
- Configure outbound webhook to n8n.  

**Credential Configuration**
- Authenticate KlickTipp API.  
- Connect Zoom via OAuth2 (`webinar:write:registrant` scope).  
- Insert correct Zoom webinar IDs in workflow nodes.  

**Field Mapping**
- Map the zoom data to the newly created KlickTipp custom fields.
- Ensure tags match campaign setup.  

---

### Testing and Deployment
1. Submit a registration form.  
2. Confirm workflow triggers and Zoom data is fetched.  
3. Verify KlickTipp contact is updated with:  
   - Join URL  
   - Start timestamp  
   - Correct segmentation tag  

‚ö†Ô∏è *Note*: Zoom OAuth tokens may expire ‚Äî refresh when needed. Zoom may also enforce API rate limits.  

---

### Campaign Expansion Ideas
- Add more webinar types and extend router.  
- Build reminder and follow-up campaigns in KlickTipp by tag.  
- Track attendance tags for automated post-event actions.  

### Customization
- Adapt Zoom nodes for webinars.  
- Add fallback logic if Zoom data is missing.  
- Trigger cross-tool automations (CRM, Slack, invoicing).  

**Resources:**  
- [Use KlickTipp Community Node in n8n](https://www.klicktipp.com/support/knowledge-base/install-klicktipp-node-n8n/)
- [Automate Workflows: KlickTipp Integration in n8n](https://www.klicktipp.com/support/knowledge-base/klicktipp-integration-n8n/)

nodes.notes: This webhook waits for data from submissions on the webinar registration landing page.

parameters.content: ## Data reception via Webhook - Landingpage submissions
## Writing webinar data into contact record

Community Node Disclaimer: This workflow uses KlickTipp community nodes.

### Introduction
This workflow automates Zoom webinar registration and transfers the data into KlickTipp via n8n. Users register through a KlickTipp landing page and the system captures relevant data, enriches contact profiles in KlickTipp, and segments them with appropriate tags. Ideal for running scalable, topic-specific webinar funnels.

### Benefits
- **End-to-end automation**: No manual data transfers between Zoom and KlickTipp‚Äîparticipants are instantly registered and segmented.
- **Dynamic segmentation**: Automatically applies tags based on webinar topic or user selections, enabling personalized follow-up.
- **Scalable setup**: Easily supports different webinar sessions and dynamic branching based on registrant input.

### Key Features
- **KlickTipp Trigger**: Starts the workflow when a contact registers through a KlickTipp landing page and receives a trigger tag (via Outbound webhook).
- **Zoom API Integration**:
  - Registers for webinar and retrieves details like start time and join link using OAuth-authenticated API nodes.
  - Supports multiple Zoom sessions dynamically based on registrant input.
- **KlickTipp Contact Sync**:
  - Adds or updates contacts in KlickTipp.
  - Populates custom fields with relevant Zoom data (join url, webinar start, webinar name)
  - Applies segmentation tags such as `webinar Participant`, or topic-specific interest tags.
- **Router Logic**:
  - Directs workflow paths based on webinar selection.
  - Easily extendable to accommodate new topics or sessions.

### Setup Instructions
**KlickTipp Preparation**
   - Create the following custom fields in your KlickTipp account:
   - `Zoom_Join_URL` (URL)
   - `Zoom_webinar_Start` (Date & Time)
   - `Zoom_webinar_Auswahl` (Text)
   - Build a KlickTipp landing page with a dropdown for webinar selection.
   - Configure an Outbound webhook in KlickTipp.

**Credential Configuration**
   - In n8n, authenticate KlickTipp and Zoom accounts:
     - Use OAuth for Zoom with appropriate scopes (`webinar:write:registrant`).
     - Add n8n OAuth Redirect URL in your Zoom Developer App.

**Field Mapping and Workflow Alignment**
   - Open the Zoom nodes for the webinar registration and insert your according webinar IDs
   - Map incoming Zoom registration data to the custom KlickTipp fields.
   - Ensure tag IDs and opt-in logic match your campaign structure.

### Testing and Deployment
1. Submit a registration via the KlickTipp form.
2. Confirm that:
   - The webhook triggers successfully.
   - Zoom data is fetched and passed into KlickTipp.
   - The contact is updated with all required data and tags.

> ‚ö†Ô∏è *Note*: Zoom rate limits and token expiration may affect repeated tests‚Äîrefresh OAuth tokens or stagger test intervals as needed.

### Campaign Expansion Ideas
- Add multiple webinars to the form dropdown and extend routing accordingly.
- Segment contacts by webinar type (e.g., `Beginner`, `Advanced`, `Topic_X`).
- Trigger customized follow-up emails in KlickTipp based on tags or attendance status.
- Use A/B tests on reminder timing or messaging.

### Customization
- Modify contact tags dynamically based on form answers or Zoom webinar ID.
- Modify the Zoom Nodes for webinar registrations
- Extend Router logic to accommodate additional session logic or integrations.
- Incorporate fallback logic for contacts missing Zoom data (e.g., backup emails or SMS).
